pages.text: $(philo)water is a curious substance, what with its bizarre self-replication and incredible anti-explosive properties. it can be surprisingly useful, but is a pain to carry around in buckets. an evertide amulet solves this problem, and more. it acts as a bottomless water bucket, with a few extra quirks. simply using it will have it materialize water, and simply having it equipped allows one to walk on water.
$(philo)a projectile can also be fired that will push creatures, or will transform into water upon hitting a block. if you instead fire this at the sky, it will start raining.
